name: Plague Doctor's Journey
description:
This game was created for the Narrative Design course for Södertörn University, the game is an early prototype and should be treated as such.

Controls  WASD: Move around
Left Click: Attack
H: Sheath/Unsheath sword

(Unsheath sword)
F: Heal
C: Wave

ESC: Hide/Open Paus Menu

Credits:
Artists: Ronny Phan and Svante Krusberg
Programming: Kimmy Karlsson Kochar and Benjamin Kalaja Madariaga

Svante Krusberg: https://www.artstation.com/svantekrusberg | https://svante-krusberg.itch.io/

Ronny  Phan: https://www.artstation.com/ronnyphan1 | https://ronnyp.itch.io/
